data.name: PongPong Girl-Free R18 Expanded Edition
data.detailed_description:
• 12 new levels
  • 12 new photos
  • 4 BOSS challenge
  • 36 new collections
data.about_the_game:
• 12 new levels
  • 12 new photos
  • 4 BOSS challenge
  • 36 new collections
data.short_description: Free R18, new levels, new photos
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card supporting DirectX 10.0
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
The characters showed in the game are all over 18 years old.
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Sexual Content, General Mature Content
